summary: This bill concerns the reliquidation of import duties for specific golf cart tires (K389 Hole-N-One) imported by Monitor Manufacturing Co., Martin Wheel, American Kenda, and Americana Development. The bill references rulings by U.S. Customs and Border Protection and aims to authorize the agency to reliquidate duty-paid entries that occurred outside the standard timeframe. It mandates reliquidation at the applicable duty rate on the date of entry and requires refunds with interest for any duties previously paid affecting hundreds of entries.
